00020 
00021 void cleanHash(hash_tab * hash, time_t sec, time_t usec, char *fileName)
00022 {
00023     flow_t *flow_hsh=NULL;
00024     init_hash_walk(hash);
00025     double hashTime=0, lastTime=0;
00026     lastTime = sec*(1e6) + usec;
00027     while ((flow_hsh = next_hash_walk(hash))) {
00028         hashTime = ( (flow_hsh->end_sec)*(1e6) ) + (flow_hsh->end_mic);
00029         if ( (lastTime - hashTime) > (TIMEOUT*(1e6)) ) {
00030             printFlowToFile(flow_hsh, fileName);
00031             clear_hash_entry(hash, flow_hsh);
00032         }
00033 
00034     }
00035     return;
00036 }
00037 
00038 int verifyTimeOut(flow_t * flow1, flow_t * flow2)
00039 {
00040         double temp1 = flow1->end_sec*(1e6) + (flow1->end_mic) ;
00041     double temp2 = flow2->end_sec*(1e6) + (flow2->end_mic);
00042     double result = temp2 - temp1;
00043     return ( result > (TIMEOUT*(1e6)) );
00044 }
00045 
00046 void verifyTimeOutHash(flow_t *flow)
00047 {
00048 
00049         static time_t start = 0;
00050         double dif;
00051         char *str = malloc(sizeof(char)*1024);
00052         extern char fileName[];
00053         //static int offCount = 0;
00054         //u_short i = 0;
00055         time_t sec=0, usec=0;
00056         
00057         
00058 
00059 
00060         
00061         if(start == 0)
00062         {
00063                 start = flow->end_sec;
00064         }
00065         else
00066         {
00067                 dif = difftime (flow->end_sec,start);
00068                 if(dif >= (double)fileAdminTimeOff)
00069                 {
00070                         //char *buffer=malloc(sizeof(char)*17);;
00071                         //offCount++;
00072                         //i=getIntLen(offCount);
00073                         //snprintf(buffer,i+1, "%u", offCount);
00074                         //snprintf(str, strlen(baseFileName)+i+1, "%s%u", baseFileName, offCount);
00075                         //printHash(str);
00076                         sec = tvSec;
00077                         usec = tvUSec;
00078                         cleanHash(test_table, sec, usec, fileName);
00079                         start = 0;
00080                         //free(buffer);
00081 
00082                 }
00083                 
00084 
00085         }
00086         free(str);
00087 
00088 
00089 }
00090 
00091 void addFlow(flow_t * flow, const struct ip *ip, unsigned short ipLen)
00092 {
00093 
00094         flow_t *flow_hsh;
00095         if(!onlineCapMode)
00096         {
00097                 verifyTimeOutHash(flow);
00098         }
00099     
00100     flow_hsh = find_hash_entry(test_table, flow);
00101     flow_t *tmp_flow = createFlow_t(ip->ip_p,ip->ip_p, NULL, NULL, flow->dst_port, flow->src_port,
00102                         (unsigned int) ntohs(ip->ip_len), 1,
00103                         flow->ini_sec,
00104                         flow->end_sec,
00105                         flow->ini_mic,
00106                         flow->end_mic, ip->ip_dst, 
00107                         ip->ip_src);
00108     flow_t *reverse_flow_hsh = find_hash_entry(test_table, tmp_flow);
00109     if (flow_hsh == NULL) {
00110         add_hash_entry(test_table, flow);
00111         u_short classifier = getID(ip, ipLen);
00112         if((reverse_flow_hsh == NULL)) {
00113                 flow->class_proto = classifier;
00114         } else {
00115                 u_short tmp_id=0;
00116                 tmp_id = verID(reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto,classifier);
00117                 reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00118                 flow->class_proto = tmp_id;
00119         }
00120 
00121     } else if (verifyTimeOut(flow_hsh, flow)) {
00122         extern char fileName[];
00123         printFlowToFile(flow_hsh, fileName);
00124         clear_hash_entry(test_table, flow_hsh);
00125         add_hash_entry(test_table, flow);
00126         u_short classifier = getID(ip, ipLen);
00127         if((reverse_flow_hsh == NULL)) {
00128                 flow->class_proto = classifier;
00129         } else {
00130                 u_short tmp_id=0;
00131                 tmp_id = verID(reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto,classifier);
00132                 reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00133                 flow->class_proto = tmp_id;
00134         }
00135 
00136 
00137     } else {
00138         u_short classifier=0;
00139         flow_hsh->n_bytes += flow->n_bytes;
00140         flow_hsh->n_frames += flow->n_frames;
00141         flow_hsh->end_sec = flow->ini_sec;
00142         flow_hsh->end_mic = flow->ini_mic;
00143         delete_flow(flow);
00144         if( (flow_hsh->class_proto == PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD) ) {//We can't classify a flow with NONPAYLOAD type only because his first packet
00145                 classifier = getID(ip, ipLen);
00146                 if((reverse_flow_hsh == NULL)) {
00147                         flow_hsh->class_proto = classifier;
00148                 } else {
00149                         u_short tmp_id=0;
00150                         tmp_id = verID(reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto,classifier);
00151                         reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00152                         flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00153                 }
00154         }
00155         else if( (flow_hsh->class_proto < DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) ) {
00156                 classifier = getID(ip, ipLen);
00157                 if( (classifier>=DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) && (classifier<PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD) ) {
00158                         if((reverse_flow_hsh == NULL)) {
00159                                 flow_hsh->class_proto = classifier;
00160                         } else {
00161                                 u_short tmp_id=0;
00162                                 tmp_id = verID(reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto,classifier);
00163                                 reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00164                                 flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167         } else if ( isSuperClass(flow_hsh->class_proto) ) {
00168                 classifier = getID(ip, ipLen);
00169                 if( (classifier>=DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER)&&(classifier<PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD)  ) {
00170                         if((reverse_flow_hsh == NULL)) {
00171                                 flow_hsh->class_proto = classifier;
00172                         } else {
00173                                 u_short tmp_id=0;
00174                                 tmp_id = verID(reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto,classifier);
00175                                 reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00176                                 flow_hsh->class_proto = tmp_id;
00177                         }
00178                 }
00179         } else if ( (flow_hsh->class_proto>UP_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER)&&(flow_hsh->class_proto<PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD) ){
00180                 classifier = getID(ip, ipLen);
00181                 if( ((classifier<=UP_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) && (classifier>=DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER)) ) {
00182                         if((reverse_flow_hsh == NULL)) {
00183                                 flow_hsh->class_proto = classifier;
00184                         } else {
00185                                 reverse_flow_hsh->class_proto = classifier;
00186                                 flow_hsh->class_proto = classifier;
00187                         }
00188                 }
00189         }
00190     }
00191     delete_flow(tmp_flow);
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*
00195  * dissect packet
00196  */
00197 void
00198 mount_flow(u_char * args, const struct pcap_pkthdr *header,
00199            const u_char * packet)
00200 {
00201 
00202     flow_t *flow;               //flow structure        
00203 
00204     /* define pointers to packet headers */
00205     const struct ether_header *ethernet;        /* ethernet header */
00206     const struct ip *ip;        /* IP header */
00207 
00208 
00209     /* ethernet headers are always exactly (time_t)(header->ts.tv_sec)14 bytes */
00210     int size_ethernet = ETHER_HDR_LEN;
00211     int size_ip;
00212     u_short ipLen;
00213     
00214 
00215     /* define ethernet header */
00216     ethernet = (struct ether_header *) (packet);
00217 
00218     /* define/compute ip header offset */
00219     ip = (struct ip *) (packet + size_ethernet);
00220 
00221     size_ip = ip->ip_hl * 4;
00222     if (size_ip < 20) {
00223         return;
00224     }
00225 
00226     u_int16_t src_port, dst_port;
00227 
00228     /* determine protocol */
00229     switch (ip->ip_p) {
00230     case IPPROTO_TCP:
00231         src_port =
00232             ((struct tcphdr *) (packet + size_ethernet +
00233                                 size_ip))->th_sport;
00234         dst_port =
00235             ((struct tcphdr *) (packet + size_ethernet +
00236                                 size_ip))->th_dport;
00237         break;
00238     case IPPROTO_UDP:
00239         src_port =
00240             ((struct udphdr *) (packet + size_ethernet +
00241                                 size_ip))->uh_sport;
00242         dst_port =
00243             ((struct udphdr *) (packet + size_ethernet +
00244                                 size_ip))->uh_dport;
00245         break;
00246     case IPPROTO_ICMP:
00247             src_port = htons(0);
00248             dst_port = htons(0);
00249             break;
00250     default:
00251         src_port = htons(0);
00252         dst_port = htons(0);
00253         break;
00254     }
00255     flow = createFlow_t(ip->ip_p, ip->ip_p, NULL, NULL, src_port, dst_port,
00256                         (unsigned int) ntohs(ip->ip_len), 1,
00257                         (time_t) (header->ts.tv_sec),
00258                         (time_t) (header->ts.tv_sec),
00259                         (time_t) (header->ts.tv_usec),
00260                         (time_t) (header->ts.tv_usec), ip->ip_src,
00261                         ip->ip_dst);
00262 
00263     tvSec = (time_t) (header->ts.tv_sec);
00264     tvUSec = (time_t) (header->ts.tv_usec);
00265     ipLen = *(unsigned short *) args;
00266     ipLen -= ETHER_HDR_LEN;
00267     if((unsigned int)(ntohs(ip->ip_len)) <= ipLen ) {
00268       addFlow(flow, ip, (unsigned int) ntohs(ip->ip_len));
00269     } else {
00270       addFlow(flow, ip, ipLen);
00271     }
00272 
00273     return;
00274 }
00275 
00276 void printHash(char *fileName)
00277 {
00278     flow_t *flow_hsh;
00279     init_hash_walk(test_table);
00280     while ((flow_hsh = next_hash_walk(test_table))) {
00281 //      fprintf(stdout,"Estamos aqui 1\n");
00282         printFlowToFile(flow_hsh, fileName);
00283     }
00284     clear_hash_table(test_table);
00285 
00286 }

00288 void task_ctrl_C(int i)
00289 {
00290     //printHash("stdout");
00291     printf("Interrupt received.\nProgram will exit now!\n");
00292     exit(0);
00293 }
00294 
00295 void *verifyHashTimeOut(void *par)
00296 {
00297         int filenameCount = 0; int flag=1;
00298         int fileAdminTime = ((admin_t *) par)->interval;
00299         int fileExpTime = ((admin_t *) par)->hop;
00300         time_t init = 0, final = 0, sec, usec;
00301         struct tm *clock = NULL;
00302         extern int analyserpxError;
00303         extern char logFileName[];
00304         extern char baseFileName[];
00305         extern char fileName[];
00306         extern int tFlag;
00307         int interCounter=0;
00308 
00309         char *filenameCountStr = malloc(sizeof(char) * 36);
00310         char *data = (char *) (malloc(sizeof(char)*7));
00311 
00312         while ((analyserpxError == 0)&&tFlag) {
00313                 sleep(fileAdminTime - (final - init));
00314                 sec = tvSec;
00315                 usec = tvUSec;
00316                 time(&init);
00317                 clock = (struct tm *)localtime(&(init));
00318                 if((interCounter>=fileExpTime)&&(fileExpTime>0)){
00319                         filenameCount++;
00320                         getDate(&init,data,6) ;
00321                         snprintf(filenameCountStr,36,"%s_%u",data,filenameCount);
00322                         snprintf(fileName,256,"%s%s",baseFileName, filenameCountStr);
00323                         interCounter=0;
00324                 }
00325                 if( ((clock->tm_hour) == 0)&&((clock->tm_min)<((int)((fileAdminTime*2)/60))) ) {
00326                         if(flag) {
00327                                 filenameCount=0;
00328                                 getDate(&init,data,6) ;
00329                                 snprintf(filenameCountStr,36,"%s_%u",data,filenameCount);
00330                                 snprintf(fileName,256,"%s%s",baseFileName, filenameCountStr);
00331                         }
00332                         flag=0;
00333                 } else {
00334                         flag=1;
00335                 }
00336                 cleanHash(test_table, sec, usec, fileName);
00337                 interCounter++;
00338                 time(&final);
00339         }
00340 
00341         if (analyserpxError) {
00342                 char buffer[50];
00343                 snprintf(buffer, 50,"ERROR CLEANING HASH. ERROR CODE: %u", analyserpxError);
00344                 writeStringToLogFile(logFileName, buffer, NULL);
00345         }
00346         free(filenameCountStr);
00347         free(data);
00348         //pthread_exit (0);
00349         return (void *) NULL;
00350 }

00384 int analyserpxStart(cap_config * conf, int fileAdminTime, int fileExpTime, char *offLineFile)
00385 {
00386     extern int analyserpxError;
00387     pthread_t hashTimeOut;
00388     extern char fileName[];
00389     extern int tFlag;
00390     admin_t *control=(admin_t *)malloc(sizeof(admin_t));
00391     control->interval=fileAdminTime;
00392     control->hop=fileExpTime;
00393     //void *ret;
00394     
00395     /* interrupt rotine to Ctrl-C */
00396     signal(SIGINT, task_ctrl_C);
00397 
00398     test_table = init_hash_table("ANALYSERPX_CAP_TABLE", compare_flow, flow_key,
00399                                  delete_flow, HASH_SIZE);
00400 
00401     //pthread_create(&hashTimeOut, NULL, verifyHashTimeOut, &fileAdminTime);
00402 
00403     if (offLineFile == NULL) {
00404             onlineCapMode = 1;
00405             pthread_create(&hashTimeOut, NULL, verifyHashTimeOut, control);
00406     }
00407     else {
00408             onlineCapMode = 0;  
00409             fileAdminTimeOff = fileAdminTime;
00410     }
00411     analyserpxError =
00412         start_capture(mount_flow, (u_char *) & (conf->snap_len), conf,
00413                       onlineCapMode, offLineFile);
00414     tFlag=0;
00415     printHash(fileName);
00416     if (offLineFile == NULL) {
00417         //(void)pthread_join(hashTimeOut,&ret);
00418         pthread_exit(verifyHashTimeOut);
00419     }
00420     //printHash(fileName);
00421     free(control);
00422     return analyserpxError;
00423 }
